title: Fizz Sucks
body:
I don't care if he's balanced, I don't care if he's popular, I don't care if he has a below 50% win rate, he's completely anti-fun.

He gets around the map faster than STD's in an orgy full of prostitutes, spends half of the time in fights untargetable with his E + Zhonya while outputting absolutely disgusting amounts of damage, impossible to run from or catch once he gets CDR, and his ult is one of the most infuriating things to get hit by, because as if it wasn't hard enough to run away from a Fizz already, it loads you up with all kinds of CC just to make sure you absolutely understand that you're 100% boned. Going out to ward and seeing that shark come from the other side of that wall, you just sit there and wait for that vile piece of filth to do his little handstand circus act and just plop on the ground and chunk you for 90% of your hp.

**GOD FORBID IF HE GETS FED**, it makes me literally feel like smashing my head against a brick wall until I pass out from the blood loss, people joke about how Teemo is Satan but honestly Teemo is literally Mecha-Jesus overdosed on steroids compared to Fizz. The only silver lining to his existence is that I have _extremely_ intense orgasms every time he dies.

It's not even satisfying to win against a team that has a Fizz, delete Fizz please, I'd honestly rather 1v1 a full build full-ad level 18 Rengar as a level 1 itemless immobile ADC than play a game with a Fizz on the enemy team.

EDIT: It's actually quite hilarious how everyone thinks I'm crying that he's "OP", it's like they just completely skipped over the first line. I literally wrote it for the sole reason of making sure people wouldn't think that I'm saying he's OP, but I guess reading is pretty hard sometimes isn't it?

That being said, I think the cooldown is a bit too low at rank 5 -- he can simply use it too much.

When I'm playing Zed I usually don't use my W to "escape" I use it to triple Q, or to disengage a fight that I'm about to get caught in. As Fizz can E in, Q out and E again much more fast than Zed can W in, q e and he can't W out.

In regards to Fizz ... yeah, everyone hates him. But being anti-fun and OP are two different things, and only one of them warrants a nerf. I still think Fizz is a bit powerful despite his recent buffs/nerfs. But if Rito wants to make him truly balanced, his troll poll should remain a 16 second cooldown at all levels.

Point click cc/burst exists because of hyper mobility. Vayne, Fizz, Zed, and so on can't hyper carry/ do thier jobs when  they go from 100% health to 15% health from one rotation of a burst mage who is fed, and frankly i would prefer to deal with a fed Annie then a fed Vayne/Fizz/Zed.

Its easier to itemize against an all ap burst with one stun, than an ap/ad burst with true damage/untargetability/ loads of mobility like these {{champion:67}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:238}}.

At least if she fails to kill me she's blown her load, and is just kind of stuck there. I might be a little biased but if i die to annie i feel like it was my own fault for not respecting her range or her damage. Then say someone dashing to me and doing the same thing as annie but blinks or dashes back out minimizing the risk to themselves.

I think you're confusing counterplay against fizz with counterplay fizz has against you.  Fizz has mechanics to "outplay" you, but you have little you can do to him.  Annie, while awful to deal with, is limited by short range and no mobility.  If she misses her bear, she's also a greatly reduced threat, whereas if fizz misses his ult and e somehow, he still has a targeted dash that applies lich bane for some reason and auto attacks that hurt like hell.  Annie also doesn't go untargetable without a zhonya, and has no notable ability to dodge both skillshots and targeted abilities.
Why?  A fed Fizz or Zed kills your carry, sure.  But a fed Annie kills your entire team.  And without counterplay, really.  Fizz's ult moves slow enough to dodge.  Annie's?  LOL, no.

If you lose your adc or ap mid you are at a big disadvantage in a teamfight. If you, as a tank, let annie get close enough to get her full rotation on your back line you have failed as a tank, as compared someone who is hard to pin down because of the mobility in their kits, I'd rather have to peel off an annie of my backline instead of some hyper mobile champ.

The QQ because someone doesn't want to learn how to play against a champ again. Fizz is easy to counter, both in build and champion selection.

Thing about Fizz is he is technically balanced. It's just that he feels completely unfair to play against and winning against him feels like an uphill battle while losing against him felt cheap. You have to heavily punish every single mistake he makes in order to get ahead of him or else he will punish you for not exploiting his brief moments of weakness, it feels like you're playing his game instead of playing how you want to. Toxic as he is though, he is still "balanced" by loosest definition, at least it's not like S4 where he was still just as rage-inducing but had higher ratios and was legitimately overpowered.
